name: RecycleMe
0:
”Alexa, ask Recycle Me how to recycle cans”
”Alexa, open Recycle Me and tell me a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recycle me
des: Recycle Me is an Alexa Skill that helps you keep track on how to recycle items. The user can ask, "Alexa ask Recycle Me how to recycle batteries" and it will be able to give an explanation on how to that. The user can also ask for facts about recycling. This informative Alexa Skill is to make users more aware of recycling
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
